mapper.select: select assignment_id, assignment_name, assignment_start_time, assignment_end_time, is_visible from assignment where is_enabled = true;

select assignment_id, assignment_name, assignment_start_time, assignment_end_time, assignment_description from assignment where assignment_id = #{assignment_id} and is_visible = 1 and is_enabled = true;
select * from assignment where assignment_id = #{assignment_id} and is_enabled = true;
mapper.insert: insert into assignment(assignment_id, assignment_name, assignment_create_time, assignment_start_time, assignment_end_time, assignment_description) values (#{assignment_id}, #{assignment_name}, #{assignment_create_time},#{assignment_start_time}, #{assignment_end_time}, #{assignment_description})
mapper.update: update assignment set assignment_name=#{assignment_name}, assignment_start_time=#{assignment_start_time}, assignment_end_time=#{assignment_end_time}, assignment_description=#{assignment_description}) where assignment_id = #{assignment_id} and is_enabled = true;
